text: I'm grateful to have joined Mr. Wan's class in Sec 1 as a Normal Academic student (now called G2). His teaching methods boosted my confidence. I was offered and took E Math at O-level in Sec 2. In Sec 4, Mr. Wan encouraged me to register A Math as an O level subject even though my lessons in school was for A Math(NA). I'm thankful to Mr Wan as I have achieved distinctions in both subjects in my recent O-level results.

Mr Wan is a great teacher. Although he doesn't seem like at first, he truly cares for his students' wellbeing and his classes are something to look forward to. His teaching methods are impressive, enabling students to understand concepts more quickly and better.
He brought up my Add Math grade from a bare pass to a distinction in the subject.
I'll miss his class and really enjoyed my time there.

I am extremely impressed with the quality of teaching at this tuition center. Both Mr. Wan and Teacher Anna are exceptionally patient and dedicated educators. It’s clear that they genuinely care about their students’ progress and well-being. Their teaching methods have not only improved understanding but have also sparked a genuine interest in mathematics. My child now looks forward to math lessons and feels much more confident tackling problems. I highly recommend this tuition center for anyone looking to provide their child with a supportive and inspiring learning environment!

Mr Wan was highly recommended by our ex neighbour. Mr Wan is very passionate in his teaching and very clear in his explaination. The material is also top notch. His style is encouraging and inspiring, focus on values and good study habit beyond academic achievement. My only regret is we should have joined earlier. My daughter did very well for her prelim and achieved AL1 in psle under his guidance. He is definitely one of the best maths teacher!

Mr. Wan’s dedication to his students is truly exemplary. Since my children joined his classes, their math skills and confidence have grown tremendously. They scored high AL1 in P5 and A1 in S1, all thanks to his outstanding coaching!

Mr. Wan has a rare talent for simplifying complex math concepts, making them accessible and manageable for students. His ability to teach higher-order thinking skills has allowed my children to tackle challenging problems with ease and confidence. Beyond academics, he instills life lessons that motivate and empower his students to reach their fullest potential.

I’m grateful that my children enjoy his classes and are making such significant progress. For any parent looking for top-notch math tuition, I can confidently say that Ammiel Wan Academy is the best choice!
